text: I'm an NPC.
Weird
Cool
Good job doing that thing
Hello I need someone to go north to deliver a message to Pacuat.
Great come back and see me once you've done it.
That's a shame.
Who are you?
I'm Pacuat. Do you have a message for me?
Great. Thanks for delivering this. Please return to Aarland
Oh. Alright.
Great thanks for talking to Pacuat.
My wagon broke down here! I can't get through!
I'm trying to get it moved. Come back later.
Hey! Deliver this stuff to the King's Guard in Pell
Thanks! We've been waiting for this stuff
Oh man! This is just what we needed. Now we can take the bridge!
Rebel filth...
Get out of here.
Hello.
